name: nearsightedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you are only able to see objects clearly that are close to you: He took his glasses off and peered nearsightedly into my face. She leaned forward in her chair and near-sightedly studied her nephew's face. The captain squinted nearsightedly at the map.
More examplesFewer examplesHe fumbled for his glasses as he nearsightedly tried to read the letter.She peered nearsightedly at the screen through her thick glasses.She looked around and blinked at us nearsightedly through her glasses.
